content: Hi folks. I'm a lightweight coder and product manager for a global health NGO. I'm interested in any work being done with grpc/protobuf and excited about https://github.com/google/fhir . I'm happy to test/document/contribute if I can. If you have other SIG or mailing lists etc that would be a better forum please let me know. @Patrik Sundberg

Great to hear! I think this is the right venue, easy for others in the community to find and join in the discussion. The #implementers channel is probably a good starting point, and also feel free to send me private messages if you have more specific questions.
